channel.title: Irc
channel.description:
So when I load Deltaanime none of my commands work, I can't identify, I can't join, I can't do anything. With every other network (partyvan, freenode, etc) I can do everything as normal.
Is this something with the network or just me?
Also, on my xchat shows the client without the user list, how do I get the user list?(No its not closed or anything.) [I'm used to mIRC, not xchat :)]
Thanks.

item.title: Irc
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

No its what lawl said, an irc operator shunned you.

Read full topic

item.title: Irc
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“Greeny, post:2, topic:186458”]partyvan. Join this I must…

Uh, Move back to mIRC for great justice. It might just be crappy xChat.[/quote]
I tried on both mIRC, xchat, and Konversation, it seems to work now so I really don’t know

Someone can lock this now.

Read full topic
